name: BranquiSpace
description:
You're in space, and you must shoot the bad guys ! What's more to say ? 

Use ZQSD, Arrow keys or your controller's Left Joystick to move. Press SPACE, Left Click or B to shoot. Game Over menu works with the mouse. For the best experience while playing in your browser, play while your browser is in FullScreen mode (Toggle this on and off with F11).

Eat the "gops" coming from the bottom to heal. Be careful ! Your health is also your ammo ! Enemies gain a shield if they eat gops and gops transform into annoying rocks when they come out of the zone you generate. If  an enemy is shooting at you, you can always parry their bullet with your own or simply dodge out of the way. There's a surprise if you eat a gop with full ammo !

Thanks for FlameOfChange for providing the music, sounds and Game Over Menu assets.  (https://flameofchange.itch.io)

Thanks for Gross Creg for helping with the code a bit.
